fields.name: active_opportunity_display
fields.fieldText:
This Account currently has an open {!varRecordTypeName} Opportunity.


See details below and either work that deal or move it to Closed Lost before creating a new one.

fields.name: OppDetailsDisplay
fields.fieldText: Set or update applicable details for your {!varRecordTypeName} Opportunity

fields.name: oppTypeDisplay
fields.fieldText: ALERT: This Account is currently a {!varRecordTypeName} Customer. Choose an option below.

fields.name: newAccountDisplay
fields.fieldText: Customer wants another {!varRecordTypeName} account. This will create a new Account in Salesforce and relate the existing contact to it.

fields.name: opptypeDisplay2
fields.fieldText: ALERT: This Account is currently a {!varRecordTypeName} Customer. Choose an option below.

fields.name: newAccountDisplay2
fields.fieldText: Customer wants another {!varRecordTypeName} account. This will create a new Account in Salesforce and relate the existing contact to it.

fields.name: Employees
fields.helpText: Defaults to Employees field from the Contact

fields.name: Forecasted_Users
fields.helpText: Defaults to Forecasted field from the Contact

fields.name: merchantAppChoiceDisplay
fields.fieldText: If/when the Application is provisioned your Opportunity will automatically be moved to Closed Won!

fields.name: Demo_Scheduled_Date
fields.helpText: If populated will copy over to the Opportunity
